name: WizardBall League
description: A collaborative project done in 3 days for the GGJ 2017 with some amazing people Two Xbox controllers are needed to play. To activate the top and bottom runes for each player hold the joystick up as you press X, B, Y or down on the joystick as you press X, B or Y A can always be pressed http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/wizardball-league
